title: Emerald & Polki Delight Earrings
features: Floral-inspired design with carefully placed Polki diamonds, adding a touch of grace and sophistication. Polkis are traditionally uncut diamonds set in gold and add a beautiful traditional look and a vintage feel. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the open setting ensures maximum brilliance.
occasions: or a festive celebration. Also ideal for a modern woman who appreciates traditional craftsmanship with a contemporary touch.
description: Experience the timeless elegance of Polki diamonds combined with the vibrant allure of emeralds. This piece celebrates traditional South Indian craftsmanship while offering a modern appeal. The high-quality materials and meticulous design ensure lasting beauty and heirloom-worthy status. Represents auspiciousness and prosperity.
